sql.name: 获取所有的机箱信息用于树展示
sql.content: select id, box_number, nfc_number from t_machine_box where 1=1 order by box_number asc

sql.name: 添加处理器
sql.content: insert into t_processor(id, machine_box_id, nfc_number, moxa_number, online, ip, create_date) values (':processorId', ':machineBoxId', ':nfcNumber', ':moxaNumber', 'N', ':ip', ':createDate' )

sql.name: 根据machineBoxId处理器
sql.content: select id, machine_box_id, nfc_number, moxa_number, online, ip, create_date from t_processor where machine_box_id = ':machineBoxId' order by create_date asc

sql.name: 根据ID获取处理器
sql.content: select id, machine_box_id, nfc_number, moxa_number, online, ip, create_date from t_processor where id = ':processorId'

sql.name: 修改处理器
sql.content: update t_processor set nfc_number = ':nfcNumber', moxa_number=':moxaNumber', ip=':ip' where id = ':processorId'

sql.name: 检查处理器NFC序列号是否存在
sql.content: select count(*) as countNum from t_processor where id != ':processorId' and nfc_number = ':nfcNumber'

sql.name: 检查处理器Moxa序列号是否存在
sql.content: select count(*) as countNum from t_processor where id != ':processorId' and moxa_number = ':moxaNumber'

sql.name: 检查处理器是否包含探测器
sql.content: select count(*) as countNum from t_detector where processor_id = ':processorId'
